text: Sonitu chimwasimane kwene (Ayudao) kuti niwali wakupapambila nnope wumi wa duniya kwapunda wandu wane, kwapunda soni wakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), jwalijose mwa jamanjao akasasachililaga ali apedwile wumi welewu wakwana yaka sausande, kutendaga kupedwa kwakwe wumi welewu nganikuwa kum'bisile kwanaula ni ilagasyo. Sanotu Allah ni Jwakuilolechesya yaakutenda
